subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Steve Wojciechowski, whose Marquette team lost to St. John’s at the Garden, is among the many former assistants to Duke Coach Mike Krzyzewski who are now head coaches elsewhere.
snippet: Steve Wojciechowski, whose Marquette team lost to St. John’s at the Garden, is among the many former assistants to Duke Coach Mike Krzyzewski who are now head coaches elsewhere.
